message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL

The paper discusses the use of Self-Organising Maps (SOM) in pattern recognition tasks, which is a topic related to machine learning (cs.LG) and computer vision (cs.CV). The focus of the paper is on improving the performance of SOMs, which is a common goal in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research. The paper also mentions the use of SOMs in recognizing spoken letters and faces, which are tasks related to natural language processing (cs.NE) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.CV, followed by cs.AI, cs.NE, and cs.CL.
